verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. also came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- house הַמֶּ֖רִי <S%H4805><s%> ham-Me-ri of a rebellious אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you יֹשֵׁ֑ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev; thou dwellest אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עֵינַיִם֩ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-na-Yim which have eyes לָהֶ֨ם la-Hem לִרְא֜וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot to see וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not רָא֗וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U, and see אָזְנַ֨יִם <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-Na-yim not they have ears לָהֶ֤ם la-Hem לִשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> lish-Mo-a' to hear וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not שָׁמֵ֔עוּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Me-'u, and hear כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> me-Ri not for they [are] a rebellious הֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem. like

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- Therefore thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man עֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Seh prepare לְךָ֙ le-Cha כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei thee stuff גוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> go-Lah, for removing וּגְלֵ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> u-ge-Leh and remove יוֹמָ֖ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam by day לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-nei-Hem; in their sight וְגָלִ֨יתָ <S%H1540><s%> ve-ga-Li-ta and thou shalt remove מִמְּקוֹמְךָ֜ <S%H4725><s%> mi-me-kom-Cha from thy place אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מָק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ma-Kom place אַחֵר֙ <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher to another לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> le-'Ei-nei-Hem, in their sight אוּלַ֣י <S%H194><s%> 'u-Lai Perhaps יִרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U, it may be they will consider כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki though בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house מְרִ֖י <S%H4805><s%> me-Ri though they [be] a rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. like

וְהוֹצֵאתָ֨ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tze-Ta Then shalt thou bring forth כֵלֶ֜יךָ <S%H3627><s%> che-Lei-cha thy stuff כִּכְלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> kich-Lei as stuff גוֹלָ֛ה <S%H1473><s%> go-Lah for removing יוֹמָ֖ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam by day לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-nei-Hem; in their sight וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah, you תֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze and thou shalt go forth בָעֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H6153><s%> va-'E-rev at even לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> le-'Ei-nei-Hem, in their sight כְּמוֹצָאֵ֖י <S%H4161><s%> ke-mo-tza-'Ei as they that go forth גּוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> go-Lah. into captivity

לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-nei-Hem in their sight חֲתָר־ <S%H2864><s%> cha-tor- Dig לְךָ֣ le-Cha בַקִּ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> vak-Kir; thou through the wall וְהוֹצֵאתָ֖ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tze-Ta and carry out בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

לְעֵ֨ינֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H5869><s%> le-'Ei-nei-Hem In their sight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above כָּתֵ֤ף <S%H3802><s%> ka-Tef [it] upon [thy] shoulders תִּשָּׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> tis-Sa shalt thou bear בָּעֲלָטָ֣ה <S%H5939><s%> ba-'a-la-Tah in the twilight תוֹצִ֔יא <S%H3318><s%> to-Tzi, [and] carry [it] forth פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha thy face תְכַסֶּ֔ה <S%H3680><s%> te-chas-Seh, thou shalt cover וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo you cannot תִרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh that thou see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; not the ground כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- as מוֹפֵ֥ת <S%H4159><s%> mo-Fet thee [for] a sign נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Ti-cha for I have set לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וָאַ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> va-'A-'as And I did כֵּן֮ <S%H3651><s%> ken so כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher I צֻוֵּיתִי֒ <S%H6680><s%> tzuv-vei-Ti so as I was commanded כֵּ֠לַי <S%H3627><s%> Ke-lai my stuff הוֹצֵ֜אתִי <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tze-ti I brought forth כִּכְלֵ֤י <S%H3627><s%> kich-Lei as stuff גוֹלָה֙ <S%H1473><s%> go-Lah for captivity יוֹמָ֔ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam, by day וּבָעֶ֛רֶב <S%H6153><s%> u-va-'E-rev and in the even חָתַֽרְתִּי־ <S%H2864><s%> cha-tar-ti- I digged לִ֥י li בַקִּ֖יר <S%H7023><s%> vak-Kir through the wall בְּיָ֑ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad; with mine hand בָּעֲלָטָ֥ה <S%H5939><s%> ba-'a-la-Tah in the twilight הוֹצֵ֛אתִי <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tze-ti I brought [it] forth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above כָּתֵ֥ף <S%H3802><s%> ka-Tef [it] upon [my] shoulder נָשָׂ֖אתִי <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ti [and] I bare לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-nei-Hem. in their sight פ Peh

וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- came the word יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai in בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker And in the morning לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אָמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru said אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha has not בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit hath not the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house הַמֶּ֑רִי <S%H4805><s%> ham-Me-ri; the rebellious מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah What עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh. unto thee What doest

אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor Say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar thou unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהֹוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD הַנָּשִׂ֞יא <S%H5387><s%> han-na-Si [concerneth] the prince הַמַּשָּׂ֤א <S%H4853><s%> ham-mas-Sa This burden הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh This בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-Ru-sha-Lam, in Jerusalem וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like בְתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> ve-to-Cham. that [are] among

אֱמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor Say אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am מֽוֹפֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H4159><s%> mo-fet-Chem; I [am] your sign כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher to you עָשִׂ֗יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti, like as I have done כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ye-'a-Seh so shall it be done לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, בַּגּוֹלָ֥ה <S%H1473><s%> bag-go-Lah unto them they shall remove בַשְּׁבִ֖י <S%H7628><s%> vash-she-Vi into captivity יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Le-chu. will go

וְהַנָּשִׂ֨יא <S%H5387><s%> ve-han-na-Si And the prince אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בְּתוֹכָ֜ם <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham that [is] among אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּתֵ֤ף <S%H3802><s%> ka-Tef upon [his] shoulder יִשָּׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> yis-Sa them shall bear בָּעֲלָטָ֣ה <S%H5939><s%> ba-'a-la-Tah in the twilight וְיֵצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ye-Tze, and shall go forth בַּקִּ֥יר <S%H7023><s%> bak-Kir through the wall יַחְתְּר֖וּ <S%H2864><s%> yach-te-Ru they shall dig לְה֣וֹצִיא <S%H3318><s%> le-Ho-tzi to carry out ב֑וֹ vo; פָּנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav his face יְכַסֶּ֔ה <S%H3680><s%> ye-chas-Seh, thereby he shall cover יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an, that אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יִרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh he see לַעַ֛יִן <S%H5869><s%> la-'A-yin with [his] eyes ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. not the ground

וּפָרַשְׂתִּ֤י <S%H6566><s%> u-fa-ras-Ti also will I spread אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רִשְׁתִּי֙ <S%H7568><s%> rish-Ti My net עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, over וְנִתְפַּ֖שׂ <S%H8610><s%> ve-nit-Pas upon him and he shall be taken בִּמְצֽוּדָתִ֑י <S%H4686><s%> bim-tzu-da-Ti; in my snare וְהֵבֵאתִ֨י <S%H935><s%> ve-he-ve-Ti and I will bring אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To בָבֶ֙לָה֙ <S%H894><s%> va-Ve-lah him to Babylon אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz [to] the land כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> kas-Dim, of the Chaldeans וְאוֹתָ֥הּ <S%H853><s%> ve-'o-Tah לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- he will not יִרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> yir-'Eh yet shall he not see וְשָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> ve-Sham there יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut. it though he shall die

וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol to every אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who סְבִיבֹתָ֥יו <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-vo-Tav all that [are] about; עֶזְרֹה 'ez-roh כעֶזְרֹ֛ו <S%H5828><s%> 'ez-Ro help קוְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all אֲגַפָּ֖יו <S%H102><s%> 'a-gap-Pav him and all his bands אֱזָרֶ֣ה <S%H2219><s%> 'e-za-Reh And I will scatter לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol and all ר֑וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach; toward every wind וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ve-Che-rev the sword אָרִ֥יק <S%H7324><s%> 'a-Rik and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem. after

וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U And they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD בַּהֲפִיצִ֤י <S%H6327><s%> ba-ha-fi-Tzi when I shall scatter אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim, them among the nations וְזֵרִיתִ֥י <S%H2219><s%> ve-ze-ri-Ti and disperse אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'a-ra-Tzot. them in the countries

וְהוֹתַרְתִּ֤י <S%H3498><s%> ve-ho-tar-Ti But I will leave מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem like אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei a מִסְפָּ֔ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par, a few מֵחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> me-Che-rev of them from the sword מֵרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> me-ra-'Av from the famine וּמִדָּ֑בֶר <S%H1698><s%> u-mid-Da-ver; and from the pestilence לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of יְסַפְּר֜וּ <S%H5608><s%> ye-sap-pe-Ru that they may declare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all תּוֹעֲבֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-vo-tei-Hem, all their abominations בַּגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim among the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- they בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u whither they come שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, in it וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD פ Peh
